title: What is the relationship between Snoop Dogg, Dr. Dre & Tupac? - Quora

response.answer_text: Business partners that became friends then (because of TuPac sharing his true feelings) became not so close friends. (I don't want to say they were enemies but they did fall out of favor of each other toward the end of Pac's life) TuPac and Dre were already rising stars becsuse of previous business in “Thee Industry”. Dr Dre (because of his half brother) found Snoop and because Marion “Suge” Knight made a wise business decision to bail TuPac out of jail and then sign him to DeathRow Records They became part of thee biggest west coast gangsta Rap group since NWA and the rest is history. I guess what I'm trying to say is Snoop Doggy Dogg heard of Dr Dre and TuPac long before TuPac and Dre heard of Snoop. The professional answer to your question is “Business Partners” and “Label Mates”. The “Hood” answer to your question is “Homeboys”.
Tupac is dead so i expect there is no relationship.
